title_teim: The twenty-eighth annual induction ceremony. 2013. Broadcast

label_teim: 2013 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Annual Induction Ceremony
label_ssm: 2013 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Annual Induction Ceremony
summary_teim: HBO master of the 2013 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction ceremony in Los Angeles, honoring Randy Newman, Donna Summer, Albert King, Quincy Jones, Lou Adler, Heart, Public Enemy, and Rush. Includes performances by the inductees and special guests, backed by Paul Shaffer and his band.
summary_ssm: HBO master of the 2013 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction ceremony in Los Angeles, honoring Randy Newman, Donna Summer, Albert King, Quincy Jones, Lou Adler, Heart, Public Enemy, and Rush. Includes performances by the inductees and special guests, backed by Paul Shaffer and his band.
contents_teim: I love L.A. (Randy Newman, Jackson Browne, Tom Petty, John Fogerty) -- Don Henley inducts Randy Newman -- Newman accepts his award -- I think it's going to rain today (Randy Newman) -- I'm dead but I don't know it (Randy Newman, Don Henley) -- John Mayer inducts Albert King -- King's granddaughter accepts the award on his behalf -- Oh, pretty woman (Gary Clark, Jr.) -- Born under a bad sign (Gary Clark Jr., John Mayer) -- Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong induct Lou Adler -- Adler accepts his award -- So far away (Carole King) -- Kelly Rowland inducts Donna Summer -- Bruce Sudano accepts the award on Summers' behalf -- Last dance (Jennifer Hudson) -- Chris Cornell inducts Heart -- Crazy on you (Heart) -- Barracuda (Heart with Mike McCready and Chris Cornell) -- Oprah Winfrey inducts Quincy Jones -- Jones accepts his award -- Rock with you (Usher) -- In memoriam [songs: The stranger (Billy Joel); How can you mend a broken heart (Bee Gees); Fight for your right (Coldplay)] -- Spike Lee and Harry Belafonte induct Public Enemy -- Public Enemy accepts their award. Chuck D speaks ; Professor Griff speaks ; Flavor Flav speaks -- Bring da noise (Public Enemy) -- Taylor Hawkins and Dave Grohl induct Rush -- Rush accepts their award. Neil Peart speaks ; Geddy Lee speaks ; Alex Lifeson speaks -- Tom Sawyer ; The spirit of the radio (Rush) -- End of show jam. [DMC/PE rap] ; Crossroads (Public Enemy, Darryl McDaniels, Tom Morello, Chris Cornell, Rush, Gary Clark Jr., John Fogerty, Ann Wilson, Nancy Wilson, Dave Grohl, Taylor Hawkins).

Chuck D speaks ; Professor Griff speaks ; Flavor Flav speaks -- Bring da noise (Public Enemy) -- Taylor Hawkins and Dave Grohl induct Rush -- Rush accepts their award. Neil Peart speaks ; Geddy Lee speaks ; Alex Lifeson speaks -- Tom Sawyer ; The spirit of the radio (Rush) -- End of show jam.
